Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.player

Class NovaPlayer

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.player.NovaPlayer
public final class NovaPlayer extends Object
Class representing a Player used in the Plugin

      public void save()

      Saves this player's information to the file.

      Information will be automatically saved with wrapper methods, so this method does not need to be called again.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(@NotNull @NotNull Economy econ, double amount) throws IllegalArgumentException, UnsupportedOperationException
      Withdraws an amount from the global bank
      Parameters:
      econ - Economy to withdraw from
      amount - Amount to withdraw
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if economy is null, or amount is negative or greater than the current bank balance
      UnsupportedOperationException - if amount is greater than the max withdraw or already withdrawn in the last 24 hours

    • deposit

      public void deposit(@NotNull @NotNull Economy econ, double amount) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Deposits an amount to the global bank
      Parameters:
      econ - Economy to deposit to
      amount - Amount to deposit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if economy is null, amount is negative, or cannot afford

      Sets the rating value for this Business.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the Business to set the rating for
      rating - Rating to set
      comment - Comment on the rating
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rating is less than 0 (no rating) / greater than 5, or business ID is null

    • hasMarketAccess

      public boolean hasMarketAccess()

      Whether this player can access the Novaconomy Market.

      If NovaMarket.isMarketMembershipEnabled() returns false or Player has novaconomy.admin.market.bypass_membership, this method will always return true.

      Returns:
      true if this player can access the market, else false

    • setMarketAccess

      public void setMarketAccess(boolean value)

      Sets whether this player can access the Novaconomy Market.

      If NovaMarket.isMarketMembershipEnabled() returns false or Player has novaconomy.admin.market.bypass_membership, this method will do nothing.

      Parameters:
      value - true if this player can access the market, else false

    • getPurchases

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<Receipt> getPurchases()
      Fetches an immutable copy of all of the purchases this player has made.
      Returns:
      All Purchases

    • getPurchases

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<Receipt> getPurchases(@NotNull @NotNull Material m)
      Fetches an immutable copy of all of the purchases this player has made for a specific Material.
      Parameters:
      m - Material to search for
      Returns:
      All Purchases for this Material

    • hasPermission

      public boolean hasPermission(@Nullable @Nullable CorporationPermission permission)

      Checks if this player has a specific corporation permission.

      This will return false if the player does not own a corporation, business, or if the permission is null.

      Parameters:
      permission -
      Returns:
      true if this player has the corporation permission, else false

    • getWonAuctions

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<AuctionProduct> getWonAuctions()

      Fetches an immutable copy of all of the Auctions this player has won.

      Expired Auctions are no longer stored in the Auction House. Use getWonAuction(UUID) for retrieval by ID.

      Returns:
      All Won Auctions

    • addWonAuction

      public void addWonAuction(@NotNull @NotNull AuctionProduct product)
      Adds an Auction to this player's won auctions.
      Parameters:
      product - Auction to add

    • awardAuction

      public void awardAuction(@NotNull @NotNull AuctionProduct product)
      Awards an auction to this player, adding it to their inventory. The player must be online.
      Parameters:
      product - Auction from getWonAuctions() to Award

    • getWonAuction

      @Nullable public @Nullable AuctionProduct getWonAuction(@NotNull @NotNull UUID id)
      Gets a won auction by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the Auction
      Returns:
      Auction, or null if not found

    • canBypassMaxNegativeBalance

      public boolean canBypassMaxNegativeBalance()
      Fetches whether this player can bypass the max negative balance. This will return false if NovaConfig.isNegativeBalancesEnabled() return false.
      Returns:
      true if this player can bypass, else false
